meanings.definition: The process of making something real or concrete.
meanings.sent1: Her actualizations of her dreams brought her great joy.
meanings.sent2: The actualizations of the architect's plans were truly impressive.
meanings.sent3: His actualizations of his imaginary friend made everyone laugh.
meanings.sent4: The actualizations of the artist's vision transformed the cityscape.
meanings.sent5: The actualizations of the scientist's theories were groundbreaking.

meanings.definition: The act of bringing something into existence or making it happen.
meanings.sent1: The actualizations of the project required teamwork and dedication.
meanings.sent2: His actualizations of his goals inspired others to do the same.
meanings.sent3: The actualizations of the party plans surprised everyone.
meanings.sent4: The actualizations of the plan were like magic coming to life.
meanings.sent5: Her actualizations of the event made it unforgettable.
